'''Epitome Invocation''' is a [[Weapon Event Wish]] in [[Version 5.5]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2025-03-26 11:00:00 UTC+8 &mdash; 2025-04-15 17:59:59

===Summary===
* During the event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star weapons {{Wish Item|Vivid Notions; Crane's Echoing Call}} will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the event-exclusive 4-star weapons {{Wish Item|Sturdy Bone; Fruitful Hook; Mountain-Bracing Bolt; Waveriding Whirl; Flower-Wreathed Feathers}} will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* During the event wish, use [[Epitomized Path]] to chart a course towards a promotional 5-star weapon, such as {{Wish Item|Vivid Notions}} or {{Wish Item|Crane's Echoing Call}}. For more information on Epitomized Path, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.
* Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapons will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
